content:
It sounds like you've had success with coffee creamer coupons in the past. That's great!

Just to clarify, as a digital AI assistant, I don't have access to specific coupon information or records of past coupon usage. I'm here to provide general guidance and advice on finding coupons and saving money.

If you're looking for similar coupons to the $2 off coupon you used on the 5th, I recommend trying the strategies I mentioned earlier:

1. Check the coffee creamer manufacturer's website for printable coupons or digital promotions.
2. Sign up for the coffee creamer brand's newsletter to receive exclusive offers and promotions.
3. Look for coffee creamer coupons on coupon websites like Coupons.com, CouponCabin, or SmartSource.

Additionally, you can also try checking with your local grocery stores to see if they have any coffee creamer coupons or promotions available.

Remember to always check the expiration dates and terms of any coupon before using it to ensure it's valid and applicable to your purchase.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
